channel.title: Safe area?
channel.description:
Hello, I'm trying to make a safe area at my pkbox. I made a line at the nonWild but it wont work, maybe I put the numbers wrong? I dunno if someone can help me this way, anyways..
|| (absX >= 3354 && absX <= 3358 && absY >= 3217 && absY <= 3209)
When I put that aboce the heigh thing it's still wild in there. I've tried like 5 times, wont work! :S Can someone help me by put the numbers right or by something else?
Thanks ~ Extoz.

item.title: Safe area?
item.dc:creator: @Extoz Extoz
item.description:
@Extoz wrote:

NO!!! IT WORKED!! THANKS ALOT!

Read full topic

item.title: Safe area?
item.dc:creator: @i_nelson_i i nelson i
item.description:
@i_nelson_i wrote:

[quote=“Extoz, post:1, topic:225798”]Hello, I’m trying to make a safe area at my pkbox. I made a line at the nonWild but it wont work, maybe I put the numbers wrong? I dunno if someone can help me this way, anyways…

            || (absX >= 3354 && absX <= 3358 && absY >= 3217 && absY <= 3209)

When I put that aboce the heigh thing it’s still wild in there. I’ve tried like 5 times, wont work! :S
Can someone help me by put the numbers right or by something else?

Thanks ~ Extoz.[/quote]

when i did somet like this i did it wrong so here if this helps tell me

|| (absX >= (x co ords of the 1st corner && absX <= x co ords of the 2nd corner && absY >= y co ord of the 1st corner && absY <= y co ord of the 2nd corner)

Read full topic
